field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enable or disable Caddy Web Server.

field.label: ACME Email
field.help: Enter the email address for certificate notifications.

field.label: Auto HTTPS
field.help: Select the auto HTTPS option. On (default) creates automatic certificates using Let's Encrypt without needing any configuration.

field.label: DNS Provider
field.help: Select the DNS provider for the DNS-01 Challenge. This is optional, since certificates will be requested from Let's Encrypt via HTTP Challenge when this option is unset. You mostly need this for Wildcard Certificates. If you have your own Wildcard certificate, you can import it to System Trust Certificates and use it in the advanced mode of a new Reverse Proxy Domain. To use the DNS-01 Challenge, enable the checkbox in the advanced mode of a Reverse Proxy Domain.

field.label: DNS API Key
field.help: Enter the API key for the selected DNS provider. Leave this empty, if no DNS provider is set.
